document.full_text: the f.a.a. said wednesday it was trying to fire an air traffic controller in knoxville, tenn., who was found sleeping during his midnight shift at mcghee tyson airport on feb. 19.
document.title: washington: air traffic controller accused of sleeping
lines_and_colors: the f.a.a. said wednesday it was trying to fire an air traffic controller in knoxville, tenn., who was found sleeping during his midnight shift at mcghee tyson airport on feb. 19.
